about_the_game:
The deluxe edition of Rosefinch's original 80s-inspired soundtrack to Interference: Dead Air. Includes the following:

  • The full soundtrack to Interference: Dead Air
  • Select segues from everyone's favorite radio DJ
  • Bonus tracks not available anywhere else!
